title: What are the leading technologies? - Quora

response.answer_text: As for this 2017 the leading tech is: Google lens announced at Google I/O 17 Android go and YouTube go LG signature OLED TV, thinner than the thinnest phone LG makes ryt now. Literally a wallpaper on the wall. And lastly, Dell's 8k monitor by the virtue of which 8k isn't a bleeding tech anymore.
The world leader in technology-Top 100 Global Tech Leaders
